alert.note: Alert for Fremont County Including Canon City, Howard, Texas Creek; Huerfano County Including Walsenburg (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued December 20 at 2:10PM MST until December 22 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A Red Flag Warning has been issued from 9 AM until 5 PM Tuesday for gusty winds and low relative humidity for fire weather zones 221, 222, 225, 229 and 230 which includes Teller and Fremont counties, the Wets and Sangre De Cristo mountains and the southern I-25 corridor of Huerfano and western Las Animas counties... ...A Fire Weather Watch has been issued for Wednesday morning through afternoon for gusty winds and low relative humidity for fire weather zones 222 and 229 which includes Fremont and Huerfano counties... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 5 PM MST TUESDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 222 AND 229... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 222 AND 229... The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 9 AM to 5 PM MST Tuesday. A Fire Weather Watch has also been issued. This Fire Weather Watch for gusty winds and low relative humidity is in effect from Wednesday morning through Wednesday afternoon. The Fire Weather Watch for Tuesday is no longer in effect. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 222 and 229. * Winds...West 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 7 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior. A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
